challenge.title: Informal Calculus with Applications to Biological and Environmental Sciences - Chapter 3
challenge.description: Tyler Seacrest, Debbie Seacrest, Rebekah Levine, and Michele Anderson's Informal Calculus with Applications to Biological and Environmental Sciences covers Calculus I.
challenge.instructions: Read Chapter Three and complete all the questions with selected solutions.
